short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize arXiv papers using Solar LLM technology
short.ko: Solar LLM을 활용한 arXiv 논문 요약 제공

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SolarXiv is a Google Chrome plug-in that helps you quickly understand the content of arXiv papers. With just a click, it summarizes the paper and provides key insights, saving you time and helping you quickly grasp the main ideas and concepts. 

Whether you're a researcher, student, or just curious about a particular topic, SolarXiv makes it easy to stay informed and up-to-date on the latest developments in your field.

It will also support follow-up questions.

You receive 100 free summaries per day. If you need more, get your API key from <https://console.upstage.ai>. Enter your API key in the extension options for it to work properly.
long.ko: ArxivGPT is a Google Chrome plug-in that helps you quickly understand the content of arXiv papers. With just a click, it summarizes the paper and provides key insights, saving you time and helping you quickly grasp the main ideas and concepts. Whether you're a researcher, student, or just curious about a particular topic, ArxivGPT makes it easy to stay informed and up-to-date on the latest developments in your field.
